main_definition: Disclaimers are statements that deny responsibility, liability or any particular assertion in a document, contract, agreement, or communication.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Statements used to limit legal liability
meanings_and_examples.example: The disclaimer at the bottom of this software states that the company is not responsible for any data loss.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Phrases indicating absence or lack of a particular quality, relationship, or responsibility
meanings_and_examples.example: Please note: The information provided in this book does not represent the views of our publisher and we make no claims as to their accuracy.
The artist included a disclaimer on his artwork stating that he did not claim ownership of any copyrighted materials used in the piece.
